ygData.subject: Re: Site for posting languages and spell recipes fro the list...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, plans are in the works for this very purpose, and more. The details are being worked on now, but a guild or group of sorts will be soon forming on
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, plans are in the works for this very purpose, and more. The details are
being worked on now, but a "guild" or group of sorts will be soon forming on
Fennin, then branching out from there eventually. It has a very similar
premise to the Conclave of Wizardry from the Dragonlance series of novels.
(Not very original, but a very good premise nonetheless, amazing it is not
already in existence.) If you aren't familiar with the idea, it is basically
a gathering of all mages, bound together for the persuit of knowledge and
the sake of magic. Those who join the Conclave can be of any race and mage
class, (and currently in a guild). In fact, it is essential that all are
represented. The original idea was not to go official, to just create a
group for the sharing of knowledge (i.e. languages, research components
etc.), but going "official" may be in future plans. A web site is in the
works, all we need now are interested people, willing to join and/or
contribute their knowledge to the Conclave. (The Conclave is a working
title, which may or may not stick.) If anyone is interested, please mail me
personally at bwgogol@.... Any input and new ideas are gladly
welcomed.

----Original Message Follows----
From: "Devlish" <dev@...>
Reply-To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Site for posting languages and spell recipes
fro the list...
Date: Wed, 12 May 1999 18:25:27 -0700

Does anyone on this list have any plans to summarize or compile some of the
knowledge from this list? Of course, this would range from sharing info to
spoilers. It would include:
- Compiled list of learnable languages (perhaps with class and race cues,
such as DE gets at Lvl 20)
- List of which components go with which classes
- Index of what language certain book, tomes, grimoires, etc. are written
in
- And of course spell recipes by class

I'm not volunteering (smile), just wondeirng if anyone has plans to put up
pages with some of this stuff or write pages for existing sites like eqss or
eqv?


Devlish DE Magician (fennin) (still in search of a good/neutral fennin
spellcasting guild)

<<<Drop me a tell if you're on Fennin.>>>

<< winmail.dat >>
